name: Weather Monitoring System
description: Monitor weather conditions and alert when temperature exceeds thresholds using OpenWeatherMap API

workflow_triggers.name: Weather Schedule Trigger
workflow_triggers.description: Trigger to check weather conditions every 3 hours

configuration.expression:
{
  "city": steps.weatherdata.body.name,
  "country": steps.weatherdata.body.sys.country,
  "temperature": steps.weatherdata.body.main.temp,
  "feels_like": steps.weatherdata.body.main.feels_like,
  "humidity": steps.weatherdata.body.main.humidity,
  "pressure": steps.weatherdata.body.main.pressure,
  "weather": steps.weatherdata.body.weather[0].description,
  "wind_speed": steps.weatherdata.body.wind.speed,
  "timestamp": $now(),
  "alert_needed": steps.weatherdata.body.main.temp > vars.temperature_threshold
}

configuration.message: "Failed to fetch weather data for " & vars.city

metadata.author: Operion
metadata.description: Real weather monitoring using OpenWeatherMap API. Requires OPENWEATHER_API_KEY environment variable.
